column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=A month ago , I bought a plane ticket online .
#text=I chose a round-trip ticket and was able to pick a window seat .
#text=The day of my flight , I arrived at the airport 2 hours early to be able to check in and go through security with plenty of time to spare to make my flight on time .
#text=I placed my baggage in the overhead bin and took my seat near the window .
#text=Two people sat next to me , filling out the row .
#text=The stewardess informed everyone about safety precautions .
#text=Everyone put their seats in the upright position and locked up their tray tables .
#text=The pilot spoke to us over the intercom , telling us to sit back and relax , and that we will reach our destination in a short time .
#text=The plane rumbled to life , sped forward , and off we soared into the sky .
#text=My ears popped from the change in air pressure but it only took a few moments for my body to acclimate itself to its new , airborne environment .
#text=The stewardess served the passengers drinks and peanuts .
#text=We were told to put our seats back in the upright position and to lock back up our tray tables .
#text=We glided to the ground and landed with a bit of a bump and jolt .
#text=The plane pulled up to the gate and we were let off .
